程序包的使用
org.apache.tomcat.util.buf

  • 使用org.apache.tomcat.util.buf的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina.authenticator
    This package contains Authenticator implementations for the various supported authentication methods (BASIC, DIGEST, and FORM).
    org.apache.catalina.connector  
    org.apache.catalina.util  
    org.apache.coyote  
    org.apache.coyote.ajp  
    org.apache.coyote.http11  
    org.apache.coyote.http11.filters  
    org.apache.tomcat.util.buf
    Buffers and Encodings This package contains buffers and utils to perform encoding/decoding of buffers.
    org.apache.tomcat.util.http
    Special utils for handling HTTP-specific entities - headers, parameters, cookies, etc.
    org.apache.tomcat.util.http.mapper  
  • org.apache.catalina.authenticator使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.buf中的类 
    类和说明
    ByteChunk
    This class is used to represent a chunk of bytes, and utilities to manipulate byte[].
  • org.apache.catalina.connector使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.buf中的类 
    类和说明
    B2CConverter
    NIO based character decoder.
    ByteChunk.ByteInputChannel
    Input interface, used when the buffer is empty Same as java.nio.channel.ReadableByteChannel
    ByteChunk.ByteOutputChannel
    Same as java.nio.channel.WrittableByteChannel.
    C2BConverter
    NIO based character encoder.
    CharChunk
    Utilities to manipulate char chunks.
    CharChunk.CharInputChannel 
    CharChunk.CharOutputChannel
    When we need more space we'll either grow the buffer ( up to the limit ) or send it to a channel.
    MessageBytes
    This class is used to represent a subarray of bytes in an HTTP message.
    UEncoder
    Efficient implementation for encoders.
  • org.apache.catalina.util使用的org.apache.tomcat.util.buf中的类 
    类和说明
    ByteChunk
    This class is used to represent a chunk of bytes, and utilities to manipulate byte[].
    CharChunk
    Utilities to manipulate char chunks.

    This class is used to represent a chunk of bytes, and utilities to manipulate byte[].
    UDecoder
    All URL decoding happens here.
